Package de.awi.floenavigation.deployment

Provides the necessary Activity and Fragments required for installing a new Station.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AISStationCoordinateFragment
    This Fragment runs on top of the DeploymentActivity and calculates the location parameters of a Fixed Station which is being deployed.
    DeploymentActivity
    This is the primary FragmentActivity for installation of a Static Station or a Fixed Station.
    StaticStationFragment
    This Fragment runs on top of the DeploymentActivity and inserts the Static Station which is being deployed in the Database.
    StationInstallFragment
    This Fragment runs on top of the DeploymentActivity and shows the layout for deployment of a Static Station or a Fixed Station depending on the value of DeploymentActivity.aisDeployment.

Package de.awi.floenavigation.deployment Description

Provides the necessary Activity and Fragments required for installing a new Station. The Station to be added can be a Fixed Station or a Static Station; since the installation of both type of stations is similar there is one main Activity DeploymentActivity which displays a common Fragment StationInstallFragment. The StationInstallFragment layout is changed based on from where the DeploymentActivity was called. If the DeploymentActivity is called from the MainActivity then the Layout for installation of DatabaseHelper.staticStationName is shown otherwise if the DeploymentActivity is called from the AdminPageActivity then the Layout for installation of DatabaseHelper.fixedStationTable is shown.

There are two different Fragments for handling of DatabaseHelper.fixedStationTable and DatabaseHelper.staticStationListTable:

AISStationCoordinateFragment handles the installation of Fixed Stations

StaticStationFragment handles the installation of Static Stations

See Also:
DatabaseHelper
